enchantment.uniqueutil.adept.desc: Less penalty for mining underwater or in-air
enchantment.uniqueutil.thick_pick.desc: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil consume Gems in your Inventory, increase Mining Speed for Blocks with a high Hardness in exchange for Gems
enchantment.uniqueutil.alchemists_blessi: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil will consume all of your Redstone in your Inventory. Requires a Beam of Light, transmutates Items on thus Beam. This Action consumes Redstone
enchantment.uniqueutil.climber.desc: Shift-rightclicking a climbable Block, will teleport you the most upper block after some seconds. You're not allowed to move meanwhile
You will now bounce when falling. Fall Damage is converted into Durability Loss
enchantment.uniqueutil.demeters_blessing: Right-clicking a grown seed, will harvest and replant it. Will gain durability from tilling, but lose from harvesting
enchantment.uniqueutil.sleipnirs_grace.d: The Movement Speed of the ridden entity is steadily increasing, even further on Paths, until you dismount
enchantment.uniqueutil.ambrosia.desc: Food and Potions will turn into the best thing you've ever tasted
enchantment.uniqueutil.anemoi_fragment.d: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil with this Item, will consume burnable Items in your Inventory. While in-air, press the dedicated Hotkey (by default Ctrl) to gain an upwards boost
enchantment.uniqueutil.demeters_soul.des: Shift-right a seed to mark it. Marked seeds will only produce 1 product and will automatically be harvested and stored into your Ender Chest
enchantment.uniqueutil.mounting_aegis.de: Shielding while riding an Entity, will also shield the Entity
enchantment.uniqueutil.pegasus_soul.desc: Press the dedicated Hotkey (by default Ctrl), your ridden entity is no longer affected by gravity
enchantment.uniqueutil.poseidons_soul.de: Throwing your Trident on an Aquatic Ressource will replicate the Block in exchange for Experience
enchantment.uniqueutil.reinforced.desc: Creates a Shield that occasionally restores Durability, but decreases your Attack Speed and Mining Speed
enchantment.uniqueutil.resonance.desc: Shift-Rightclicking will cause your Tool to resonate with nearby Ores, giving you an Indicator of their location but has to stabilize again. Using this again while the Item stabilizes you'll take Damage
enchantment.uniqueutil.sages_soul.desc: Improves your Item by Wisdom. Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil will transfer Experience to the Item
enchantment.uniqueutil.phanes_regret.des: On healing, returns a part of the healing as damage. On damage received, returns a part of the damage as healing, consumes Experience after healing
enchantment.uniqueutil.rocketman.desc: A Rocket can force you into Elytra Mode. Rocket Flight Duration increased
enchantment.uniqueutil.famines_odium.des: Will eat occasionally Food from your inventory, regardless of your Hunger or Saturation, and wont restore full Hunger Value. If no Food is found in Inventory the Player will take damage

tooltip.uniqueutil.climb.fail.name: Top is obstructed

tooltip.uniqueutil.crops.full.name: You've reached max. Crops in Auto Harvester
